abstract: Creates a map you embed on a webpage and initializes it with the constructor options you choose.

codeExamples.code: const map = new mapkit.Map('mapContainer', { center: new mapkit.Coordinate(37.334883, -122.008977) });

overview:
## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map] instance.

## Discussion

The map’s constructor takes an optional `parent` argument and an optional `options` argument. If you specify the `parent` argument, MapKit JS inserts the map element into the DOM as a descendant of `parent` that it styles to fill the size of its enclosing element. A map defaults to showing the entire world.

The following example demonstrates how to add a map to a `DIV` element using HTML:

The following example demonstrates how to add a map to a `DIV` element using JavaScript:

--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/MapConstructor crawled: 2025-12-05T12:20:42Z --- # new Map(parent, options) **Constructor** Creates a map you embed on a webpage and initializes it with the constructor options you choose. ## Declaration ```swift constructor( parent?: string | HTMLElement | null, options?: MapConstructorOptions, ); ``` ## Parameters - **parent**: A DOM element, or the ID of a DOM element, to use as your map’s container. - **options**: Options that [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapConstructorOptions] defines for initializing the properties of your map. ## Return Value A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map] instance. ## Discussion The map’s constructor takes an optional `parent` argument and an optional `options` argument. If you specify the `parent` argument, MapKit JS inserts the map element into the DOM as a descendant of `parent` that it styles to fill the size of its enclosing element. A map defaults to showing the entire world. The following example demonstrates how to add a map to a `DIV` element using HTML: ```other
``` The following example demonstrates how to add a map to a `DIV` element using JavaScript: ```javascript const map = new mapkit.Map('mapContainer', { center: new mapkit.Coordinate(37.334883, -122.008977) }); ``` ## Creating a map - **MapConstructorOptions**: An object that contains options for creating a map’s features.

items.description: An object that contains options for creating a map’s features.
items.name: MapConstructorOptions

title: new Map(parent, options)
